entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
